static_fields.headline: Urushi Silver Makie Dials for DIVIDO | Minase watches | Handmade in Japan
static_fields.author.name: kellyhenriksen
static_fields.description: Minase’s latest creation in the Divido collection pays tribute to Japan’s finest traditional crafts. Following on from the success of the blue hand-lackered dial of the regular serie, Minase is lauching a more special and artisanal version, blue, green and red Urushi silver makie dials Handcrafted in the studio of Urushi master Megumi Shimamoto, in Kyoto, this new dial is a gift for the eye.
static_fields.name: Urushi Silver Makie Dials for DIVIDO | Minase watches | Handmade in Japan
